channel.title: All Skills Display Level 99 Please Help!
channel.description: Hey guys I am running the Aggroth V1 client and server and I ran into a problem. Every skill displays 99/99 no matter the ACTUAL level that you are. I have tried everything I could think of to fix it and have searched all over the place and haven't found a solution to it. If ANYONE has ANY ideas it would greatly be appreciated. Or if you have used this source and know how to fix it and could do it over Team Viewer I'd give you a staff ranking on my server. Thank you, -Anthony

item.title: All Skills Display Level 99 Please Help!
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Pure_:

You aren’t updating players properly/the client is not parsing updating properly, read the respective wiki page on your protocol (assuming it exists) or compare with another server (same revision ofc).

You make it sound a lot worse than it can be.
For all we know he’s just not sending the right ID’s to the skill tab…

Read full topic
item.source: All Skills Display Level 99 Please Help!

item.description:
@anthonyarggg wrote:

Hey guys I am running the Aggroth V1 client and server and I ran into a problem. Every skill displays 99/99 no matter the ACTUAL level that you are. I have tried everything I could think of to fix it and have searched all over the place and haven’t found a solution to it. If ANYONE has ANY ideas it would greatly be appreciated. Or if you have used this source and know how to fix it and could do it over Team Viewer I’d give you a staff ranking on my server.
Thank you,
-Anthony
